alert.note: Alert for Grady; Kingfisher; Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:23PM CDT until June 16 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KINGFISHER...NORTHWESTERN GRADY...NORTHERN CADDO... NORTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA...SOUTHERN LOGAN AND CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 922 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Cedar Valley to near Union City to 3 miles west of Gracemont, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, Edmond, El Reno, Guthrie, Kingfisher, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Tuttle, Piedmont, Nichols Hills, Union City, Minco, Okarche, Cashion, Binger, Calumet, and Gracemont. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
